trans-unit.source: Represents the value returned from a database comparison operation between Oracle data types, and exposes methods used to perform data type conversions.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il valore restituito da un'operazione di confronto di database tra tipi di dati Oracle ed espone i metodi utilizzati per eseguire conversioni di tipi di dati.

trans-unit.source: The key difference between an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure and a standard **Boolean** value is that, where a standard `Boolean` has two possible values, `true` and `false`, an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure has three possible values, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False>, or <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null>.
trans-unit.target: La differenza principale tra un <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> struttura e standard **booleano** è che, in cui uno standard `Boolean` sono possibili due valori, `true` e `false`, un <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> struttura dispone di tre possibili valori, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False>, o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure does not map to an Oracle `Boolean` data type; it is exposed as a convenience support class.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> struttura non è mappato a un Oracle `Boolean` del tipo di dati; è esposto come una classe di supporto di praticità.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="Boolean" /> to be used as the initial value of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Valore <see langword="Boolean" /> da utilizzare come valore iniziale della struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure using the specified <see langword="Boolean" />.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> utilizzando il valore <see langword="Boolean" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="integer" /> to be used as the initial value of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Valore <see langword="integer" /> da utilizzare come valore iniziale della struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure using the specified integer.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> utilizzando l'intero specificato.

trans-unit.source: If `value` is 0, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> is `false`; otherwise it is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se `value` è 0, il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> è `false`; in caso contrario è `true`.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: Computes the bitwise AND of two specified <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: Calcola l'operatore AND bit per bit di due strutture <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> specificate.

trans-unit.source: The result of the logical AND operation as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Risultato dell'operazione AND logica come illustrato nella tabella seguente.

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Value of <paramref name="x" /></term><description> Value of <paramref name="y" /></description><description> Result
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Valore di <paramref name="x" /></term><description> Valore di <paramref name="y" /></description><description> Risultato

trans-unit.source: An object to compare, or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da confrontare o riferimento null (<see langword="Nothing" />in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Compares this <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure to a specified object and returns an indication of their relative values.
trans-unit.target: Confronta la struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> con un oggetto specificato e restituisce un’indicazione dei valori relativi.

trans-unit.source: A signed number indicating the relative values of the instance and value.
trans-unit.target: Numero con segno che indica i valori relativi di istanza e valore.

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Value
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Valore

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Description
trans-unit.target: </term><description> Descrizione

trans-unit.source: </description></listheader><item><term> A negative integer
trans-unit.target: </description></listheader><item><term> Numero intero negativo

trans-unit.source: </term><description> This instance is less than <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> L'istanza è minore di <paramref name="value" />.

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> Zero
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> Zero

trans-unit.source: </term><description> This instance is equal to <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> L'istanza è uguale a <paramref name="value" />.

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> A positive integer
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> Intero positivo

trans-unit.source: </term><description> This instance is greater than <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> L'istanza è maggiore di <paramref name="value" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: oppure

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> è un riferimento null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Any instance of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean>, regardless of its value, is considered greater than a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Qualsiasi istanza di <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean>, indipendentemente dal valore, viene considerato maggiore di un riferimento null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structures to determine if they are equal.
trans-unit.target: Confronta due strutture <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> per stabilire se sono uguali.

trans-unit.source: The object to be compared.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: Compares the supplied object parameter to the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.
trans-unit.target: Il parametro dell’oggetto fornito viene confrontato con l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if object is an instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> and the two are equal; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se l’oggetto è un’istanza di <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> e i due sono uguali; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structures to determine if they are equal.
trans-unit.target: Confronta due strutture <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> per stabilire se sono uguali.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" /> if the two instances are equal or <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" /> if the two instances are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> che è <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" /> se le due istanze sono uguali o <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" /> in caso contrario.

trans-unit.source: If either instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null" />.
trans-unit.target: Se una delle istanze di <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> è null, la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> sarà <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null" />.

trans-unit.source: Represents a false value that can be assigned to the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> property of an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un valore false che può essere assegnato alla proprietà <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> di un’istanza della struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False> field is an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure constant.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False> campo è un <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> costante per la struttura.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il codice hash per l'istanza.

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: Codice hash di un intero con segno a 32 bit.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the current <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" />.
trans-unit.target: Indica se la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> corrente è <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see langword="Value" /> is <see langword="False" />, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <see langword="Value" /> è <see langword="False" />, <see langword="false" /> in caso contrario.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value%2A> is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null>, this property still is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value%2A> è <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null>, questa proprietà è ancora `false`.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether or not the value of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure is null.
trans-unit.target: Indica se il valore della struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> è null.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> value of the structure is **Null**, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se il <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> valore della struttura è **Null**, in caso contrario <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the current <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" />.
trans-unit.target: Indica se la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> corrente è <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see langword="Value" /> is <see langword="True" />, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <see langword="Value" /> è <see langword="True" />, <see langword="false" /> in caso contrario.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value%2A> is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null>, this property still is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value%2A> è <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null>, questa proprietà è ancora `false`.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: Compares two instances of <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> to determine if they are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Confronta due istanze di <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> per stabilire se non sono uguali.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" /> if the two instances are not equal or <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" /> if the two instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> che è <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" /> se le due istanze non sono uguali o <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" /> in caso contrario.

trans-unit.source: If either instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null" />.
trans-unit.target: Se una delle istanze di <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> è null, la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> sarà <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null" />.

trans-unit.source: Represents a null value that can be assigned to the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> property of an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un valore null che può essere assegnato alla proprietà <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> di un’istanza della struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null> field is an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure constant.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null> campo è un <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> costante per la struttura.

trans-unit.source: Represents a value of one that can be assigned to the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> property of an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un valore uno che può essere assegnato alla proprietà <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> di un’istanza della struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.One> field is an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure constant.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.One> campo è un <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> costante per la struttura.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: Performs a ones complement operation on the supplied <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: Esegue un’operazione complemento a uno sulle strutture <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> fornite.

trans-unit.source: The one's complement of the supplied <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.
trans-unit.target: Complemento a uno dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> fornito.

trans-unit.source: If the <see langword="Boolean" /> contains a null value the result also is a null value.
trans-unit.target: Se l'oggetto <see langword="Boolean" /> contiene un valore null, anche il risultato sarà un valore null.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: Computes the bitwise AND of two specified <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: Calcola l'operatore AND bit per bit di due strutture <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> specificate.

trans-unit.source: The result of the logical AND operation as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Risultato dell'operazione AND logica come illustrato nella tabella seguente.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: Computes the bitwise OR of its two <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> operands.
trans-unit.target: Calcola l’operatore OR bit per bit dei due operandi <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: The result of the bitwise OR operation as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Risultato dell'operazione OR bit per bit come illustrato nella tabella seguente.

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Value of <paramref name="x" /></term><description> Value of <paramref name="y" /></description><description> Result
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Valore di <paramref name="x" /></term><description> Valore di <paramref name="y" /></description><description> Risultato

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Or%28System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean%2CSystem.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: Il metodo equivalente per l'operatore è <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Or%28System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean%2CSystem.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: Compares two instances of an <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> for equality.
trans-unit.target: Confronta due istanze di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> per stabilire se sono uguali.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" /> if the two instances are equal or <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" /> if the two instances are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> che è <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" /> se le due istanze sono uguali o <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" /> in caso contrario.

trans-unit.source: If either instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null" />.
trans-unit.target: Se una delle istanze di <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> è null, la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> sarà <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null" />.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: Il metodo equivalente per l'operatore è <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: Performs a bitwise exclusive-OR operation on the supplied <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> parameters.
trans-unit.target: Esegue un’operazione OR esclusivo bit per bit sui parametri <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> forniti.

trans-unit.source: The results of the bitwise XOR operation as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Risultati dell'operazione XOR bit per bit come illustrato nella tabella seguente.

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Value of <paramref name="x" /></term><description> Value of <paramref name="y" /></description><description> Result
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Valore di <paramref name="x" /></term><description> Valore di <paramref name="y" /></description><description> Risultato

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Xor%28System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean%2CSystem.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: Used for explicit <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> conversion.
trans-unit.target: Da utilizzare per la conversione <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> esplicita.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> to convert.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> da convertire.

trans-unit.source: Converts an <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> to a <see langword="Boolean" />.
trans-unit.target: Converte un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> in un oggetto <see langword="Boolean" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Boolean" /> set to the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.
trans-unit.target: Valore <see langword="Boolean" /> impostato sulla proprietà <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> di <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> contains a null value.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> contiene un valore null.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber" /> to be converted to an <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber" /> da convertire in una struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: Converts the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber" /> parameter to an <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Il parametro <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber" /> viene convertito in una struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure whose value equals the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber.Value" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Nuova struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> con valore uguale alla proprietà <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber.Value" /> del parametro <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber" />.

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber> is 0, the value of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> is `false`; otherwise, the value of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se il valore della <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber> è 0, il valore di <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> è `false`; in caso contrario, il valore della <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> è `true`.

trans-unit.source: A string to be converted to an <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Stringa da convertire in una struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: Converts a string to an <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Converte una stringa in una struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure whose value equals the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Nuova struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> con valore uguale alla proprietà <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber.Value" /> del parametro <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure to be tested.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> da verificare.

trans-unit.source: Used to test the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> to determine whether it is false.
trans-unit.target: Da utilizzare per verificare se la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> è false.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the supplied parameter <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> is false; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se il parametro <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> fornito è false; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.IsFalse?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: Il metodo equivalente per l'operatore è <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.IsFalse?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Boolean" /> value to be converted to <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.
trans-unit.target: Valore <see langword="Boolean" /> da convertire in <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: Converts a <see langword="Boolean" /> value to an <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.
trans-unit.target: Converte un valore <see langword="Boolean" /> in <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> value containing 0 or 1.
trans-unit.target: Valore <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> contenente 0 o 1.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: Compares two instances of <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> for inequality.
trans-unit.target: Confronta due istanze di <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> per determinarne la disuguaglianza.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" /> if the two instances are not equal or <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" /> if the two instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> che è <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" /> se le due istanze non sono uguali o <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" /> in caso contrario.

trans-unit.source: If either instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null" />.
trans-unit.target: Se una delle istanze di <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> è null, la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> sarà <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null" />.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.NotEquals%28System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean%2CSystem.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: Il metodo equivalente per l'operatore è <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.NotEquals%28System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean%2CSystem.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> on which the NOT operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> su cui viene eseguita l’operazione NOT.

trans-unit.source: Performs a NOT operation on an <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.
trans-unit.target: Esegue un’operazione NOT su un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> with the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /><see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" /> if argument was true, <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null" /> if argument was null, and <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" /> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> con proprietà <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /><see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" /> se l'argomento era true, <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null" /> se l'argomento era Null e <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" /> negli altri casi.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: Performs a one's complement operation on the specified <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.
trans-unit.target: Esegue un’operazione complemento a uno sull'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: The one's complement of the specified <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.
trans-unit.target: Complemento a uno dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.OnesComplement%28System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: Il metodo equivalente per l'operatore è <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.OnesComplement%28System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure to be tested.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> da verificare.

trans-unit.source: Used to test the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> to determine whether it is true.
trans-unit.target: Da utilizzare per verificare se la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> è true.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the supplied parameter <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> is true; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se il parametro <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> fornito è true; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.IsTrue?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: Il metodo equivalente per l'operatore è <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.IsTrue?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: Performs a bitwise OR operation on the two specified <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: Esegue un’operazione OR bit per bit sulle due strutture <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> specificate.

trans-unit.source: The result of the bitwise OR operation as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Risultato dell'operazione OR bit per bit come illustrato nella tabella seguente.

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Value of <paramref name="x" /></term><description> Value of <paramref name="y" /></description><description> Result
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Valore di <paramref name="x" /></term><description> Valore di <paramref name="y" /></description><description> Risultato

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.String" /> to be converted.
trans-unit.target: Elemento <see cref="T:System.String" /> da convertire.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation of a logical value to its <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> equivalent.
trans-unit.target: Converte la rappresentazione <see cref="T:System.String" /> specificata di un valore logico nell’equivalente <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure containing the parsed value.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> contenente il valore analizzato.

trans-unit.source: Converts the current <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> to a string.
trans-unit.target: Converte la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> corrente in una stringa.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the value of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.
trans-unit.target: Stringa contenente il valore dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: If the value is null, the string contains a null value.
trans-unit.target: Se il valore è null, nella stringa sarà presente un valore null.

trans-unit.source: Represents a true value that can be assigned to the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> property of an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un valore true che può essere assegnato alla proprietà <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> di un’istanza della struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True> field is an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure constant.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True> campo è un <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> costante per la struttura.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure's value.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il valore della struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è di sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" />; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> è <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" />; <see langword="false" /> in caso contrario.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: Performs a bitwise exclusive-OR operation on the supplied parameters.
trans-unit.target: Esegue un’operazione esclusiva OR bit per bit sui parametri forniti.

trans-unit.source: The results of the logical XOR operation as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Risultato dell'operazione XOR logica come illustrato nella tabella seguente.

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Value of <paramref name="x" /></term><description> Value of <paramref name="y" /></description><description> Result
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Valore di <paramref name="x" /></term><description> Valore di <paramref name="y" /></description><description> Risultato

trans-unit.source: Represents a value of zero that can be assigned to the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> property of an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un valore zero che può essere assegnato alla proprietà <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> di un’istanza della struttura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Zero> field is an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure constant.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Zero> campo è un <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> costante per la struttura.
